resources:
SSI competence manager. Open navigation bar. Close navigation bar. SSI capability manager christoph.weissenborn@posteo.de title settings valid until: messages Job search The SSI identity "%s" you want to login with is not registered yet. Please register before logging in. capability overview. Help View on website capability requirements: filter All quotations. Filter by capabilities in SSI wallet. Apply Now Your application to %s has been sent automatically. Thank you very much. From: %s Appendix: (capabilities) Appendix: (signed proof of capabilities) Deny. To SSI signing > Send to SSI wallet. Check Mark as favourite. Dear:student:in,
aneto the proof of capability to your course.
\continue to wish you success in your studies! Dear %s
hier team, I am applying to you in response to the %s advertisement. Enclosed is the evidence of the competencies you require.. Do you wish to inform the sender of the message that his request has been denied?. Your request has been denied. You have no new messages. Yes. No Competence. The SSI wallet app is not installed. Please install the SSI wallet app first. The capability evidence does not match the capability taxonomy used in this app. Please select appropriate evidence. New message. Send new messages not implemented. Reply to existing messages. How can I confirm competencies? In the message view, you will receive requests from learners for proof of competencies. There you can also access the Wallet app to sign evidence. These are automatically sent with a message to the requests.. How can I find jobs that match my competencies?. Select the filter in the list of job offers in the top right corner. This will launch their wallet where they can select due credentials they have. They will then be shown a filtered list of matching jobs.. How can I vote for new skills?. Select the competence overview in the menu bar. There they will also see suggestions for new competencies that they can vote for.. For more information, visit https://github.com/gXeeXqBHuHDFTaEnff3Z/ssi_demos All competencies. State Votes Vote YES Vote NO until You have voted. Report. Are you sure you want to report this capability entry as misused? The entry has been reported to the moderators. Thank you for signing. The credential was send to %s. Filter capabilties by state Search for job offer
